alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Edmunds; Hughes; Jones; McPherson; Potter; Stanley; Sully; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 7:49PM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
